Housekeeping services has been engaged but they do not provide detergents and floor cleaners. He is running out of them and has not enough money to buy more.

name: Pots and Pans
description:
The community iniative, Masak-Masak is a space where residents come together to cook and eat, build friendship and strengthening their social support in the community. Isolated seniors will drop by the community hub situated at the void deck and will cook together with other residents which also support hungry children after school. 

The residents are in need of HALAL induction stove friendly pots and pan. These items will ensure the continuation of their efforts in building a caring and supportive community.
